root.name: Kung Fu Strike: The Warrior's Rise
root.description: OverviewKung Fu Strike: The Warrior's Rise is a brawler developed by Qooc Soft and published by 7Sixty for the Xbox Live Arcade and PC.It's an old-school beat-em-up game.PC System RequirementsMinimum:OS:Win Vista (32/64 bit), Win XPProcessor:2.0+ GHZ Single Core ProcessorMemory:1GB RAM GB RAMGraphics:NVIDIA 6200+ or ATI Radeon 9600+, Shader Model 3.0 compatibleDirectX速:9.0cHard Drive:3 GB HD spaceSound:DirectX速: 9.0c compatibleOther Requirements:Broadband Internet connectionAdditional:X360 controller supportRecommended:OS:Win Vista (32/64 bit), Win 7 (32/64 bit), Win XPProcessor:3.0 GHZ Dual Core ProcessorMemory:1GB RAM GB RAMGraphics:NVIDIA 7900 GS or EquivalentDirectX速:9.0cHard Drive:3 GB HD spaceSound:DirectX速: 9.0c compatibleOther Requirements:Broadband Internet connectionAdditional:X360 controller support
